thread.title: Nintendo Switch Online Services Will Be Free... At First
thread.title_full: Nintendo Switch Online Services Will Be Free... At First

author: Seth G. Macy
title: Nintendo Switch Online Services Will Be Free... At First
text:
Nintendo Switch online services were explained during Nintendo's Live Event. 
The online service will be available for free after launch, and then will switch to a paid service in Q3 of 2017. 
The service will allow you to play online matches, find and add friends, and the usual functionality you'd expect from a console in 2017. 
Price and further details haven't been released at the time of this writing. 
The Nintendo Switch live event is currently happening and you can watch along with us. 
Seth Macy is refreshing Amazon to pre-order right now. Follow him on Twitter . 
Continue readingâ€¦
